info.name: Common POpbill Cashbill API
info.description:
When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer authentication is stored in the variable of Collection Scope.


So, You must always call GetToken to test the API.

exec: * GetToken is a sample code that issues a Bearer token to be entered in
* the Authentication header when calling the POPBiLL API.
* (See the POPBILL API Certificate PDF Manual for more information)
// The LinkID and SecretKey are credentials and are changed to the values ​​provided by POPBiLL.
* The following code is that makes up the HMAC Message Digest
// access_id is the Seller Business Registration Number (10 digits number except hyphen('-'))
// and the Scope array is a list of service codes that can be used for the issued token.
var TokenRequest = stringify({access_id : Access_id, scope : Scopes});
// request header for API Server HMAC authentication.

request.description: Request Token for POPBiLL API.

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.

request.description:
ㆍCheck whether a cashbill ID is in use or not.

ㆍThe cashbill ID is a unique value assigned by user to avoid duplicated issuance and organized e-Cashbill systematically.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#CheckMgtKeyInUse

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.

request.description:
ㆍRegister and Issue the e-Cashbill. At the same time of issuance, points(fee) is charged and notification mail is sent to customer.

ㆍThe status of cashbill is changed to 'ISSUED' when the result is returned successfully.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#RegistIssue

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// └ A unique value combined English letter, numeric, hyphen(‘-’) and underbar(‘_’)
// BulkSubmit API can accept the issuance of 100 e-Cashbill per submission
// Created 100 e-Cashbill in a loop to help understand the BulkSubmit API.
// The date and time of trading (Format : yyyyMMddHHmmss)
// └ 소득공제용 = To deduct income tax, 지출증빙용 = To proof the expenditure in business
// └ 일반 = General(Default), 도서공연 = Book and Performance, 대중교통 = Public Transportation
// └ Sum of {@no.11 supplyCost}, {@no.12 tax} and {@no.13 serviceFee}
// [Seller] Business Registration Number of user (10 digits except ‘-’)
// [Seller] Identification Number for minor place of business
// └ Case1. {@no.7 tradeUsage} = ‘소득공제용’(To deduct income tax) : Resident Registration Number / Mobile / (e-Cashbill) Card Number / 010-000-1234 (for voluntary issuance)
// └ Case2. {@no.7 tradeUsage} = ‘지출증빙용’(To proof the expenditure in business) : Business Registration Number / Resident Registration Number / Mobile / (e-Cashbill) Card Number
// └ When {@no.26 smssendYN} = ‘true’, a message is sent to this value
// Whether user send a notification message
// BulkSubmit API - POST Request Body object
// Generate a Message digest for Request Body message validation

request.description:
ㆍSubmit the issuance of bulk cashbills. A single transaction processes maximum 100 cashbills.

ㆍDuplicated submission ID and e-Cashbill data are not accepted and it’s handled by returning registered submission ID, not the error code and message.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#BulkSubmit

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// Assigned submitID for the bulk submit

request.description:
ㆍCheck the submission status for bulk issuance using SubmitID.

ㆍThe issuance result is returned when the submission status(variable: txState) is changed to ‘2’(successfully completed).

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#GetBulkResult

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.

request.description:
ㆍDelete an e-Cashbill in status of ‘FAILED’ to reuse the cashbill ID of failed cashbill.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#Delete

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.

request.description:
ㆍRegister and Issue an e-Cashbill for revocation with the cost information* as much as to be revoked. (*Supply values, Tax amount, Service fee and Total amount)

ㆍThe status of cashbill is changed to 'ISSUED' when the result is returned successfully

※ Issuance for revocation is only available to the status of ‘Succeed’.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#RegistIssue

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.

request.description:
ㆍCheck the status of a single e-Cashbill and summarized information.

ㆍCheck variable ‘stateCode’ of returned ‘CashbillInfo’ to confirm the status of e-Cashbill.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#GetInfo

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.

request.description:
ㆍCheck the status of multiple e-Cashbills and summarized information. (Maximum : 1,000 cashbills)

ㆍCheck variable ‘stateCode’ of returned ‘CashbillInfo’ to confirm the status of e-Cashbill.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#GetInfos

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.

request.description:
ㆍCheck detailed information of a single e-Cashbill.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#GetDetailInfo

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// └ R = Date of registration, W = of trading, I = of issuance
// Initial date of search scope (Format : yyyyMMdd)
// Last date of search scope (Format : yyyyMMdd)
// └ Wild card(*) can be put on 2nd, 3rd letter – e.g. "3**"
// └ Valid Value : N / C (multiple choice is possible)
// └ Valid Value : P / C (multiple choice is possible)
// └ P = To deduct personal income tax, C = To proof the expenditure in business
// └ Valid Value : N / B / T (multiple choice is possible)
// └ N = General, B = Book and Performance, T = Public Transportation
// └ Valid Value : T / N (multiple choice is possible)
// The number of list to be displayed per page (Maximum : 1,000)
// Customer’s identification number : Business registration number(for company) / Resident registration number(for individual) / Mobile / (e-Cashbill) Card number
// Identification Number for minor place of business
// └ one more numbers must be separated by comma(',') (e.g. 1234,1110)

request.description:
ㆍSearch e-Cashbill corresponded to the search criteria. (Maximum period for search scope : 6 months)

ㆍDefault of optional fields is ‘to search ALL’.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#Search

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// └ TBOX = Draft list, PBOX = A list of issued e-Cashbill, WRTIE = Create an e-Cashbill

request.description:
ㆍGet the URL to access the menu related to e-Cashbill of POPBiLL website in login status.

ㆍReturned URL is valid for 30 seconds and after the valid time, page is not opened.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#GetURL

request.description:
ㆍResend a notification mail to customer. There's no minimum time required and no maximum number of calling API.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#SendEmail

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
contents : 'test sms', // Contents of SMS (*Exceeded contents are truncated automatically)

request.description:
ㆍSend a SMS(short message) to notify issuance of e-Cashbill. To call this API, an additional cost is charged apart from the issuance cost.

ㆍUser can check the result of sending SMS on POPBiLL website [문자·팩스(Messaging/FAX) -> 문자(Messaging) -> 전송내역(Sending log)]

ㆍSMS's capacity is 90byte and exceeded contents are truncated automatically. (Maximum of Korean letters: 45)

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#SendSMS

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.

request.description:
ㆍSend issued e-Cashbill by fax. To call this API, an additional cost is charged apart from the issuance cost.

ㆍUser can check the result of sending fax on POPBiLL website [문자·팩스(Messaging/FAX) -> 팩스(FAX) -> 전송내역(Sending log)].

https://docs.popbill.com/en/cashbill/java/api#SendFAX
